definitions.title: n.pr.loc
definitions.body: (prob. = portion, territory);—([[חִמְנׇה]] Jos 15:10, Jos 15:57, 2Ch 28:18; [[תִּמְנׇ֫תֶה]] [as nomin. v. GFM: Ju Jdg 14:1] Jos 19:43, Ju Jdg 14:1, Jdg 14:2, Jdg 14:5; c. [[ה]]; loc. [[תִּמְנׇ֫תָה]] Ge 38:12, Ge 38:13, Ge 38:14, Ju Jdg 14:1, Jdg 14:5; LXX Qamna, Qamnaqa):—
place in hill-country of Judah Ge 38:12, Ge 38:13, Ge 38:14. prob. = Jos 15:57. Site unknown (cf. Di:Ge 38:12 Rob:BR ii. 17 n.).

place on border of Judah Jos 15:10, Jos 19:43 (assigned to Dan), Ju Jdg 14:1, Jdg 14:1, Jdg 14:2, Jdg 14:5, Jdg 14:5, 2Ch 28:18. Mod. Tibneh, c. 15 m. S. of W. fr. Jerusalem cf. Rob:BR ii.17 Buhl:Geogr. 196.
